Hello, there. I’m Yew Wee. I'm a big data analyst and web developer from Singapore. I'm currently working in Accenture Analytics , helping clients to build apps / platform to discover more about data.

I enjoy building cool machine learning apps using Python, JavaScript, React & integrating it with APIs.

In my spare time I love to run. I train and travel for marathons.

I'm currently getting my hands dirty in NodeJS and just started on contributing to the open source JS community with Node, writing / refactoring tests for them.

Latest Work

Speech Sentiment Analyzer

An app built on create-react-app that uses Web Speech API to convert speech to text and get the sentiment of the text via Azure Text Analytics API.

First Runner-Up in Accenture Global AI Hackathon

Accenture AI solution for recruiting, shortlisting employees skilled in AI. ML classification for identifying candidates, chatbot to perform the interview and a R shiny app for dashboard visualization.

Simple React Weather App

A simple weather app built using React with create-react-app and react-bootstrap.

Singlish Chatbot on Slack

Singlish Marathon Chatbot on Slack with NodeJS, AWS and API.ai.
